title: How To Succeed At Stock Photography: A Designers Perspective
description: There are plenty of great books out there about how to take amazing stock photography, but there is a missing element…who is going to buy all those photos you are taking?Written by two marketing powerhouses who have purchased 1000's of stock photography images over the years, this book will help you to find out what the marketplace is dying to have and how to make your pictures the ones that are flying off the stock photography sites.We wrote this book in hope that all the talented photographers out there will provide us with even more great images to use in our marketing efforts. A dynamic marketing duo, the authors are actively engaged in massive online and offline marketing efforts, both for themselves and their clients.Some of the areas that this book covers include:What Is Stock PhotographyWhy Take Another Picture Of The Same ThingPhoto Layout Is Key For DesignersHow Do Designers Functionally Use Stock PhotographyMiscellaneous Stock Photography Tips How Do Designers Choose Stock PhotographyTaking Pictures For The SeasonsThe whole second half of the book is a comprehensive overview of the year, detailing specific subjects that designers are looking for, giving you a checklist of pictures that you can be sure will get a look! Never get "stuck" again, from now on you will have a built in template for what to take when to ensure sales.
author: Tara Jacobsen
